short_summary: Customization Services of Toyota 4Runner to replace EAV01 Ford 350
description: The objective of this SOW is to announce TC’s intention to contract a bidder to assemble a finished EAV, for which the base vehicle (Toyota 4Runner) will be provided as Government Supplied Material. This vehicle will replace the old EAV-001, for the Pacific (PAC) Region.
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Customization Services for Toyota 4Runner Vehicles

## Project Overview
To replace the EAV01 Ford 350 fleet in the Pacific (PAC) Region, the Department of Transport (TC) is issuing a tender for the customization services of Toyota 4Runner vehicles.

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference:** WS4115166711-Doc4241336363
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4115166711
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 10, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 23, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** February 23, 2024

## Service Requirements
TC is seeking a bidder to assemble a finished EAV (Engineer Vehicle) from a Government-Supplied Material (GSM) Toyota 4Runner base vehicle. The customized vehicle will replace the old EAV-001 and serve the Pacific Region.

## Bidder Eligibility
The tender is open to all qualified bidders. Bidders must be able to provide the required documentation and meet all necessary qualification criteria.

## Evaluation Criteria
Tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is covered under several trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Contact Information

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
